Substrate

class motac.substrate.Grid(lat, lon, cell_size_m)[source]

Bases: object

Regular grid substrate.

Coordinates are stored as WGS84 centroids for downstream modelling.

lat: ndarray
lon: ndarray
cell_size_m: float
__init__(lat, lon, cell_size_m)
class motac.substrate.NeighbourSets(travel_time_s)[source]

Bases: object

Sparse travel-time neighbourhoods between grid cells.

matrix[i, j] = travel time in seconds from i to j (0 on diagonal).

travel_time_s: csr_matrix
__init__(travel_time_s)

class motac.substrate.SubstrateBuilder(config)[source]

Bases: object

__init__(config)[source]
build()[source]
class motac.substrate.SubstrateConfig(north=None, south=None, east=None, west=None, place=None, graphml_path=None, cell_size_m=250.0, max_travel_time_s=900.0, disable_pois=False, poi_tags=None, poi_geojson_path=None, cache_dir=None)[source]

Bases: object

Configuration for substrate building.

Provide one of:

  • bbox (north, south, east, west)

  • place (OSM place query string)

  • graphml_path (local graph for offline/testing)

POIs are optional. For M1 we support:

  • disable_pois=True

  • poi_geojson_path (local) OR poi_tags + (bbox/place/graph)

north: float | None
south: float | None
east: float | None
west: float | None
place: str | None
graphml_path: str | None
cell_size_m: float
max_travel_time_s: float
disable_pois: bool
poi_tags: dict[str, Any] | None
poi_geojson_path: str | None
cache_dir: str | None
static from_json(path)[source]

Configuration for substrate building.

Provide one of:

  • bbox (north, south, east, west)

  • place (OSM place query string)

  • graphml_path (local graph for offline/testing)

POIs are optional. For M1 we support:

  • disable_pois=True

  • poi_geojson_path (local) OR poi_tags + (bbox/place/graph)
